comments:
I turned off autobuild, deleted the old swt projects from my workspace, 
connected to the new repository, and added the swt projects from the new 
repository.
The add completed ok, so I did a Rebuild All.
I got the "build errors" dialog, with 2 NullPointerExceptions in 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.builder.impl.JavaBuilder.
